subject: Iran-PJAK conflict
object: West-Azerbaijan, Kordestan and Kermanshah Provinces in Iran, Kurdistan Region in Iraq and Ağrı Province in Turkey

subject: Iran-PJAK conflict
object: Ongoing | [ | failed verification | ] | [ | dubious | - discuss | ] | First cease fire established in September 2011, as Iran's government claimed victory, while PJAK allegedly withdrew from Iranian territory. | PJAK redeploy their positions across the Iran-Iraq border. | Sporadic clashes take place in 2013-2015 | A wider conflict erupts in 2016
